function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Family of super spreaders causing second wave of infections","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improved contact tracing and isolation measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, digital surveillance","People":"Residents of Kerala","Owner":"State government"},{"Description":"Reliance on community volunteers for disaster response","Impact":"Exposure of volunteers to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Providing volunteers with protective gear and training, reducing reliance on community volunteers","Technologies":"Protective gear, training programs","People":"Community volunteers, residents in quarantine","Owner":"State government, civic organizations"},{"Description":"Transfer of surveillance data management to a U.S. consultancy","Impact":"Risk of mishandling sensitive health data","Mitigation":"Strict data protection agreements, oversight and accountability measures","Technologies":"Secure data management systems","People":"Residents of Kerala","Owner":"State government"}]}
